model.map.shapes

Class PolygonMapComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.map.MapComponent
      • model.map.PhysicalMapComponent
        • model.map.shapes.PolygonMapComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PolygonShape, SimulationObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Area, PhysicalObject, Sensor

    public abstract class PolygonMapComponent
extends PhysicalMapComponent
implements PolygonShape
    A polygon map component.
    Author:
    S.A.M. Janssen
